sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: For cre-dependent enriched expression of GCaMP6s in axons.
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refBib: In vivo measurement of afferent activity with axon-specific calcium imaging. Broussard GJ, Liang Y, Fridman M, Unger EK, Meng G, Xiao X, Ji N, Petreanu L, Tian L. Nat Neurosci. 2018 Sep;21(9):1272-1280. doi: 10.1038/s41593-018-0211-4. Epub 2018 Aug 20. 10.1038/s41593-018-0211-4 PubMed 30127424
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:shipment: Viral particles are shipped frozen on dry ice. Plasmid DNA (≥ 200ng) will also be included in the shipment.
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refMethod: pAAV-hSynapsin1-FLEx-axon-GCaMP6s was a gift from Lin Tian (Addgene plasmid # 112010 ; http://n2t.net/addgene:112010 ; RRID:Addgene_112010) For viral preps, please replace (Addgene plasmid # 112010) in the above sentence with: (Addgene viral prep # 112010-AAV5) or (Addgene viral prep # 112010-AAV9)
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:storage: Store at -80℃. Thaw just before use and keep on ice.
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:purpose: For cre-dependent enriched expression of GCaMP6s in axons
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:pricing: $350 USD for preparation of 100 µL virus + $30 USD for plasmid.
